# append(_:)

**Instance Method**

Append a buffer of bytes to the data.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func append<SourceType>(_ buffer: UnsafeBufferPointer<SourceType>)
```

## Parameters

- **buffer**: The buffer of bytes to append. The size is calculated from `SourceType` and `buffer.count`.

## Adding Bytes

- **append(_:)**: Appends the specified data to the end of this data.
- **append(_:count:)**: Appends the specified bytes from memory to the end of the data.
- **append(contentsOf:)**: Appends the bytes in the specified array to the end of the data.

items.description: Appends the specified data to the end of this data.
